Subject: NEO BEAST WARS

Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Ursa Major" <logomorph@...>


* A stasis pod falls from the sky and lands in the forest.  It crashes 
through many trees and comes to rest against a large tree.  The bot inside 
starts to stir.  The hatch opens and a bot slowly emerges from the pod.  She 
in her Kodiak Bear form slowly climbs out of the pod and stands on all fours 
next to the pod.  She looks around and sees the damage done to the forest by 
the pod landing.  She sees the green trees and blue skys above her.  She 
sniffs the air and smells the forest and the sweetness in the flowers that 
grow along the path. She smiles and thinks how she was lucky to land in such 
a wonderful place.  Then suddenly she feels weak.  Her legs give out from 
under her and she collapses.  She looks over and sees darkness creeping in 
on her.  She goes unconsious.*
